Default Constructor

ุงฺฏุฑ ูฺ Constructor ูููุณูุ C# ุจูโุตูุฑุช ุฎูุฏฺฉุงุฑ ฺฉ Default Constructor ุจุฏูู ูพุงุฑุงูุชุฑ ูโุณุงุฒุฏ:

ฺูุฏ Constructor (Overloading)

ฺฉ Class ูโุชูุงูุฏ ฺูุฏ Constructor ุฏุงุดุชู ุจุงุดุฏ: 


class User
{
    public string Username;
    public int Level;

    public User()
    {
        Username = "Guest";
        Level = 1;
    }

    public User(string username)
    {
        Username = username;
        Level = 1;
    }

    public User(string username, int level)
    {
        Username = username;
        Level = level;
    }
}

ุงู ฺฉุงุฑ ุจุงุนุซ ูโุดูุฏ Objectูุง ุงูุนุทุงูโูพุฐุฑ ุณุงุฎุชู ุดููุฏ.

    {
        Name = name;
        Price = price;
    }

    public Account(decimal balance)
    {
        if (balance < 0)

    }

ฺฉ Class ูโุชูุงูุฏ ฺูุฏ Method ุจุง ฺฉ ูุงู ุงูุง ูพุงุฑุงูุชุฑูุง ูุชูุงูุช ุฏุงุดุชู ุจุงุดุฏ:

        Console.WriteLine(text);

    {
        Console.WriteLine(number);
    }
